history.proof: intros c sigma sigma' H. intro H0. destruct H0 as [t H1]. rewrite H1 in H. qsimpl time: 1 use: at_head_of_queue_intro.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable t.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (c : Client_index) (sigma sigma' : Name -> Data), queue (sigma Server) = [] -> at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue sigma' c

Premises:
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
at_head_of_queue = fun (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) => exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = c :: t : (Name -> Data) -> Client_index -> Prop Arguments at_head_of_queue _%function_scope
Record Data : Type := mkData { queue : list Client_index; held : bool } Arguments mkData _%list_scope _%bool_scope
queue = fun d : Data => let (queue, _) := d in queue : Data -> list Client_index
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
at_head_of_queue_intro : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue (sigma Server) = c :: t -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
at_head_of_nil : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index), at_head_of_queue sigma c -> queue (sigma Server) = [] -> False
snoc_at_head_of_queue_preserved : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), queue st' = queue (sigma Server) ++ [x] -> forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c
locks_correct_update_true : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) (st' : Data), held st' = true -> at_head_of_queue sigma c -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client c) st')
locks_correct_unlock_true_to_false : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (p : packet) (x : Client_index) (st' : Data), at_head_of_queue sigma x -> held st' = false -> pSrc p = Client x -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st') p
locks_correct_unlock_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pSrc p = Client c -> pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
locks_correct_locked_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pDst p = Client c -> pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
empty_queue_all_clients_false : forall sigma : name -> data, locks_correct sigma -> queue (sigma Server) = [] -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locks_correct_at_head_preserved : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data), locks_correct sigma -> (forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c) -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st')
locks_correct_unlock_at_head_preserved : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (p : packet), locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> (forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c) -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') p
all_clients_false_locks_correct_server_update : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (st : Data), (forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false) -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st)
locks_correct_true_at_head_of_queue : forall (sigma : name -> data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held (sigma (Client x)) = true -> at_head_of_queue sigma x
locks_correct = fun sigma : name -> data => forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments locks_correct _%function_scope
unlock_in_flight_all_clients_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct sigma -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locked_in_flight_all_clients_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct sigma -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locks_correct_locked_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
valid_locked = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pDst p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_locked _%list_scope _%bool_scope
valid_unlock = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pSrc p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_unlock _%list_scope _%bool_scope
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms -> pSrc p = h -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_locked = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_locked _%function_scope
locks_correct_unlock = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Unlock -> exists c : Client_index, valid_unlock (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_unlock _%function_scope
mutual_exclusion = fun sigma : name -> data => forall m n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client m)) = true -> held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> m = n : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments mutual_exclusion _%function_scope
locks_correct_locked_input_handlers_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p

```coq
intros c sigma sigma' H.
intro H0.
destruct H0 as [t H1].
rewrite H1 in H.
apply at_head_of_queue_intro.
exists t.
rewrite H.
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros c sigma sigma' H. intro H0. destruct H0 as [t H1]. rewrite H1 in H. apply at_head_of_queue_intro. exists t. rewrite H. reflexivity.
